name: Battletank LOBA
description: Battle your friends on the same computer in this pick up and play arcade combat game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, Win 7, Win 8 Processor: 2 Ghz processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 512MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 4 Xbox 360 controllers for local multiplayer

reviews.review_text: Really simple bare bones arcade tank game.
